text: 3.10: Ro 8.38; 11.33; Ef 1.21; 1 Pi 1.12Ana fhum mba bigi vhagiap, kegap, ntigem ana won siosan panan hɨgap, ana ntigem won mbarkɨrga ndɨkndɨgir vhuuiŋ, ana nta ndiv hiaŋ tɨgi. Ana ntigem wo ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ guarira, ana nta ndi hiaŋ tɨgim, Hevenan enseri mbe buiva gari ŋkasŋkagi ki, mbe vhɨra Fhe Bakɨmen ndɨkndɨgi kaŋgirga.
